clauses.title: Confidentiality
clauses.summary: Both parties agree to keep confidential information secure and not disclose it to third parties.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: The agreement may be terminated by either party with a 30-day notice period.

aiInsights.risk: High data exposure risk due to vague confidentiality clause.
aiInsights.recommendation: Add specific data protection measures and penalties for breaches.

aiInsights.risk: Termination clause might be too short for operational readiness.
aiInsights.recommendation: Increase notice period to at least 60 days.

evidence.snippet: Confidential information includes trade secrets, proprietary data, and client records.
The agreement can be terminated with 30 days written notice by either party.
